content.raw:
That seems like a fine approach to me. 

* On the left, Reset All would reset the view, arm, and any models they've added to the scene, correct? The models would reset to their original pose, I'd guess. Is there a tooltip on that button explaining what it'll reset?

* On the right GUI, how often will users have multiple tests? We may need to grey out the Next Test button if there's only one test.  I'm not clear on how we expect teams to use this feature.

* Louise, would you be able to remove the little arrow on the Settings icon? I think the icon alone should suffice affordance-wise.
